validations.description: Ensures that account number is provided and is not spaces.
validations.condition: When processing account operations, CHECK that ACCOUNT-NUMBER is not equal to spaces.
validations.failureOutcome: Set error code ACCOUNT-ERR and skip processing for this record.

validations.description: Validates that the initial deposit amount is at least $100.
validations.condition: When creating a new account, IF INITIAL-DEPOSIT < 100 THEN validation fails.
validations.failureOutcome: Set error code DEP-AMT-ERR and output error message.
